amendatorysection.para: It is hereby declared to be the public policy of the State of Nebraska that consumers of shell eggs in this state be assured of the quality and quantity of shell eggs purchased. In furtherance of this policy, the Legislature hereby declares it to be its intent that shell eggs purchased by consumers in this state shall be quality graded and weight classified in accordance with procedures established under the Nebraska Graded Egg Act, which procedures shall, insofar as practicable, be consistent with those adopted by the United States Department of Agriculture under the Egg Products Inspection Act, 21 U.S.C. 1031 et seq., and the Agricultural Marketing Act of 1946, 7 U.S.C. 1621 et seq.
